Address.label: Address
Address.value: 27500 RIVERVIEW CENTER BOULEVARD, BONITA SPRINGS, Florida, 34134, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Herc Holdings is an equipment rental company that was spun out of Hertz Global in 2016. It is currently the third-largest equipment rental company (3% market share) in North America, after United Rentals and Sunbelt Rentals, with a fleet size of $5.1 billion. It serves commercial and residential construction customers, the environmental sector, industrial entities, and entertainment production companies. During much of its 50-year-plus history, the company has rented equipment such as aerial lifts to its customers for intermittent use. More recently, it has broadened its catalog to include a host of specialty items. Separately, Herc Holdings' strategy now incorporates long-term rentals to industrial customers where Herc maintains its own staff at the customer site.
